caddy                  = localhost
caddy.0_with_spaces    = "a b c d"
caddy.1_without_spaces = "abcd"
caddy.2_multiple       = "a b c d" "abcd"
caddy.3_back           = `a b c d`
caddy.4_escaped        = "a\"b"
caddy.5_unbalanced     = "a
caddy.6_unbalanced     = a"
----------
localhost {
	with_spaces "a b c d"
	without_spaces abcd
	multiple "a b c d" abcd
	back "a b c d"
	escaped "a\"b"
	unbalanced a
	unbalanced "a\""
}
